name: Skyward (itch) (amshin98)
description:
Your goal is to destroy all of the targets within the allotted time while avoiding the falling debris,

== CONTROLS == 

Space - Lock cursor to screen

Esc - Free cursor 

W/S - Accelerate/Decelerate 

A/D - Roll left/right 

Mouse - Rotate ship 

Left click - Fire R - Reset
